author: rforrester
title: Arsenal legend Robert Pires gets strikingly similar tattoo like his stunning wife
text:
Arsenal legend Robert Pires gets strikingly similar tattoo like his stunning wife 
Jessica Lemarie-Pires took to Instagram to show off the duo's latest artwork By Richard Forrester Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ARSENAL legend Robert Pires showed off his new tattoo which looks strikingly similar to his wife’s latest piece. 
Jessica Lemarie-Pires took to Instagram to show off the duo’s new ink on their right arms before admitting she is addicted to the artwork. Instagram @jessicalemariepires 4 Jessica Lemarie-Pires uploaded this picture to her Instagram of their matching tattoos 
Standing side-by-side, Jessica uploaded the snap to her 16,700 followers alongside the caption: “Partners in crime…#tattoo #addicted”. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
His tattoo appears to an eagle but he has a long way to go until he catches up with Jessica’s collection of bodywork. 
According to the Daily Mail , her Japanese cherry blossom tattoo on her right forearm is ink work number 20. 
She also revealed that she has ‘What doesn’t kill you makes you stronger’ on her right bicep after admitted she didn’t have a nice life before she met her husband. Instagram @robert_pires07 Robert Pires took a leaf out of his wife’s book as she boasts 20 tattoos Instagram @robert_pires07 Arsenal legend Robert Pires getting his latest tattoo related articles 'I did not even listen' Barcelona starlet Sergi Samper reveals he rejected Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger last summer YOUNG GUN Arsenal legend Robert Pires' son Theo already named captain of Gunners' Under-9 side Mira image Juventus step up Alexis Sanchez chase by offering Gunners' prime target Miralem Pjanic in swap deal BAD MAX Max Allegri nearing Juve exit after bust-up with top stars, 'f*** off' rant at linesman and freezing out Patrice Evra Instagram @jessica_lemarie_pires
